QuestData.Title: Silence of the Dwarves
QuestData.Description: The spirits of my soldiers haunt this fort now, $g lad:lass;. Their souls are now bound to this place. Even in death they continue to fight for it. 'Tis sad.$B$BPut 'em out o' their misery and perhaps ye shall have the spoils of yer people's victory.
QuestData.RewardText: They fight for their land even after death - much like the Forsaken. I will report back to high command that Dun Garok is uninhabitable. Let them keep what they hold so dear.
